node.title: How to Configure IIS in Windows Server 2016
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
Yesterday I had to configure IIS for a new Windows Server 2016, so I just wanted to keep this post as a reference for the future configurations. Though configuring IIS is quite easy, but we should know what all things we should Install for the successful installation.

At first click on Server Manager on Top Left. You can easily find the server manager on the Start Menu or you can search.

![s1.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWDZ4kYbFs4avJJsN2v8k5NrZuAq3xjo2RV8NCa7CA65S/s1.png)

After you open the Server Manager, click on Add roles and features as shown below. 

![s2.PNG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmTWR5ePEuCr8JFvPfw15gMvHidgjo7hYmv8X31jzo3eK9/s2.PNG)

As you see that it says, "This wizard helps you to install roles, role services or features". 

![s3.PNG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQhAPj66NqUvRsevhaEKtuaBvbcAAm7s54fptG5RmSkoU/s3.PNG)

On clicking of next, you need to select the Installation Type which will be "Role-based or feature-based Installation"

![s4.PNG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmNXD1RNyGGtWDQ6bWFbvGHqjEc5RYmEfRBygSKV2wqLaM/s4.PNG)

The server selection will be the current server which will be automatically selected.

![s5.PNG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmboGwDoorj5cZiu3NYWCn5bE8sTT27dEaFEUcYKWWr62h/s5.PNG)

Now you have to select the Web Server (IIS) to configure IIS in the current server. 

![s6.PNG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmeojaedozfYVkRjLtmBGw5i2y5b6vkPSCNo72vf1aD2QT/s6.PNG)

Since we just required IIS Management Console or the first time, I will be selecting that only. You can select whatever features you need.

![s7.PNG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmX8t3pWzBrstGmNHc6Z5XUTFBJWQXYuFgnPN9K6HYqewN/s7.PNG)

Next, you need to select what all the features you need for your IIS. Do not forget to select HTTP Activation which will help you to deploy your Asp.Net applications. 

![s8.PNG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmViq5apin5CGkeRzKsjoEZk5WiEayNoXKFSHA5TNadXRA/s8.PNG)

In the role services, some of the roles will be auto-selected, but you do have an option to change your selections.

![s9.PNG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWoLCPdMd34rndQatBxmNnBRt2BMqJWKW3HmRvrzs3xH8/s9.PNG)

Now you can hit Install to install the selected Roles and Features. You do not need to restart the Server as IIS does not require the system to be restarted. 

![s10.PNG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmPzNSfKaVQvxadtnX6hvb1h4KeopydznVPzcMpHDKsvaR/s10.PNG)

And then You are done, Voila !!!. You can search IIS from the search console.

![s11.PNG](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmejk4FfLfDRZV3AdKRDDRw42ACYeduXQuk4Q8HDQfC8MJ/s11.PNG)

<hr>
<center>All Original Pictures of My Server</center>

node.title: Saturday with my Bike
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
So today was the day for a long drive, I just do not wanted to go any place but wanted to go for a long drive for around 100kms from Bangalore. Its good when you do not have any place in mind because that will help you to not check the route again and again and you might end up finding something spectacular. 

I have not got a good picturesque place but it was good than other places. Below are the pictures of a lake with rocks inside it, which looks like the lake is in mountain region and the weather was also too kind to give an additional beauty to the shot.

node.title: An Opportunity for Developers - IBM's Call for Code for Disaster Preparedness
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
An Opportunity for Developers - IBM's Call for Code for Disaster Preparedness 

Call for Code rivalry is an IBM activity in association with United Nations, David Clark Cause also, the Linux Foundation, to utilize most recent innovations for cataclysmic event readiness and help. It is a call to join the developers over the globe to settle the issues caused by catastrophic events. 

As you may realize that most recent 10 years has been one of the most noticeably awful periods for the cataclysmic event and 2017 was on the best and the opportunity has already come and gone to concoct something which will have an effect universally. 

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQm7FYHbrwMvRqtBSGGXahKihb7qDKyNoqb8pKhEXBsZm/image.png)
PC : https://developer.ibm.com

To begin Developers have been given 6 mechanical territories and they are : 

1. Construct secure, flexible, traceable, and straightforward supply systems with blockchain – This should be possible when we can have a store network arranges over blockchain which can enhance the dispersion of help when a noteworthy catastrophe. 

2. Utilize AI and bots to enhance continuous interchanges with characteristic dialect handling – This should be possible by making a bot which will make individuals educated about the catastrophe also, can help them as and when required. 

3. Comprehend, break down, and foresee wellbeing and nourishment need to enhance administrations with information science – This should be possible by enhancing the insusceptible arrangement of people heretofore by giving immunizations. 

4. Enhance coordination in view of movement and climate action to diminish the number of individuals influenced – This is one of the primary concern which should be possible by enhancing the plane and prepare administrations to the influenced territories so individuals can leave peril as fast as conceivable. 

5. Gather and break down gadget sensor information to make group or protection move consequently – No one knows when can a cataclysmic event will happen however we can utilize some past information to get a few suspicions about the approaching debacles. 

6. Utilize machine adapting, profound learning, and visual acknowledgment to enhance basic forms – A considerable measure of shrewd urban communities are coming up, however, is the urban areas inclined to the cataclysmic event, for that we can have a visual acknowledgment innovation to survey that city or zone for the chance before building anything. 

The Natural Disasters are essentially arranged into 6 classifications and they are : 

1. Tropical storms and Typhoons 
2. Tremors and Tsunamis 
3. Surge and Storm Surge 
4. Volcanoes 
5. Extraordinary Weather 
6. Fierce blazes 

You may think what is in for engineers, at that point, I should disclose to you that your thought/model will get a long haul support to move that thought or model to the certifiable application. Long haul support will accompany IBM's $30 million venture more than five years where they will finance your engineer apparatuses, advances utilized, and additionally preparing with specialists. 

More Details : https://ibm.co/2NbTUJO

node.title: How much Tax you need to pay for Cryptocurrencies in India?
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
There is still a lot of doubt in the minds of Indian cryptocurrencies Investors about how much tax they need to pay for cryptocurrencies earnings. One think to note that even if you hold cryptocurrencies, you are liable to be taxed if you are not trading it. 

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmTaL9GneuVVChgpxnHjKqZaWFAvUge4gtMJmkx1me2KKC/image.png)
PC : https://pixabay.com/en/taxes-tax-office-tax-return-form-646512/

Till now, our Indian government has not specified any tax bracket for cryptocurrencies, i.e. as of now taxes are still income-based. If your income plus cryptocurrencies earnings falls under tax liability then you have to pay the tax to the government. However, government is planning to bring either of the two tax slabs and that is 12% (items marked as Goods) or 18%(items marked as capital gains).

For example, if you are earning Rs 10000 you have to either pay Rs 1200 or Rs 1800 based on the slabs.

Though there are no way to evade the tax from Indian Government because your bank accounts will have the KYC attached. 

<hr>

भारतीय निवेशकों के दिमाग में अभी भी बहुत संदेह है उनकी कमाई को लेके की उन्हें कितना कर चुकाना होगा। भले  ही आप क्रिप्टोक्रोपॉर्ड्स धारण करते हैं, फिर भी यदि आप इसे व्यापार नहीं कर रहे हैं तो आप कर लगाने के लिए उत्तरदायी हैं।

अब तक, हमारी भारतीय सरकार ने क्रिप्टोक्रुअनियों के लिए कोई टैक्स ब्रैकेट निर्दिष्ट नहीं किया है, यानी अब करों के आय-आधारित हैं। यदि आपकी आमदनी के साथ क्रिप्टोकैरियां कमाई कर देयता के तहत आती है तो आपको सरकार को कर चुकाना होगा। हालांकि, सरकार दो कर स्लैबों में से किसी एक को लाने की योजना बना रही है और यह 12% (वस्तुओं के रूप में चिह्नित वस्तुओं) या 18% (पूंजीगत लाभ के रूप में चिह्नित वस्तुओं) है।

उदाहरण के लिए, यदि आप 10000 रुपये कमा रहे हैं तो आपको स्लैब के आधार पर 1200 रुपये या 1800 रुपये का भुगतान करना होगा।

यद्यपि भारतीय सरकार से कर से बचने का कोई तरीका नहीं है क्योंकि आपके बैंक खातों में केवाईसी संलग्न होगा।

node.title: Accelerated Mobile Pages - Building the future web, together
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
# Accelerated Mobile Pages Building the future web, together --- ## Screenshots
![1.PNG](https://i.imgur.com/gzWcobL.png)
--- ## Hunter's comment As of now we all want a Web Page or application which will be faster, user friendly and responsive. We spend a lot of time coding to make the application like that with bunch of testing and everything. Wouldn't it be great if everything is coded for you and you just have to import that in your application, this is where AMP comes into picture where it is very simple to create smooth and faster web pages which is totally controlled-able and customize-able. According to AMP, >AMP is an open-source library that provides a straightforward way to create web pages that are compelling, smooth, and load near instantaneously for users. AMP pages are just web pages that you can link to and are controlled by you. If we talk about architecture than AMP is mainly build on AMP HTML (It is just a plain HTML with some restrictions for improved performance), AMP JS (It is a library is used for fast rendering of AMP HTML pages) and AMP Cache (it is used to serve cached AMP HTML pages). An Intro Video by https://www.ampproject.org https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WrpkFROqR0Q What I liked most about the project is that it is Open Source and will change the ecosystem of whole internet by serving web pages faster. --- ## Link https://www.ampproject.org/ --- ## Contributors Hunter: @codingdefined ---

![Steemhunt.com](https://i.imgur.com/jB2axnW.png)
This is posted on Steemhunt - A place where you can dig products and earn STEEM. [View on Steemhunt.com](https://steemhunt.com/@codingdefined/accelerated-mobile-pages-building-the-future-web-together)
